name: NWProtocolTLS
desc: A network protocol for connections that use Transport Layer Security.

items.name: class NWProtocolTLS.Options
items.desc: A container of options for configuring how TLS is used on a connection.

items.name: static let definition: NWProtocolDefinition
items.desc: The system definition of the Transport Layer Security protocol.

items.name: class NWProtocolTLS.Metadata
items.desc: A handle you can use to inspect a connection's TLS state.
